pages.title: Mana Manifestation
pages.text: I guess you're excited to use your newly attuned Manatite, right? Well it's time to make a decision on how you you'll express the power of your Manatite. There are two ways:$(li)Rings - they offer passive benefits to the wearer and can let out a small burst of power when used at the cost of a long cooldown. The manatite that's embedded into cannot be removed;

$(li)Staffs - when used these items will manifest an enormous burst of magic. There are four tiers, one an upgrade to it's predecessor. You can change and remove manatites on the fly.$(br2)Refer to your Compendium to clear mind and make your choice.
Cannot be used as is, must be awoken first. An expert Manasmith can do this by embedding a single string of Manaweave into the ring through an anvil.
The simplest of all the staffs. Doesn't matter your level of expertise in magic. One $(l)MUST$() start from here. Refer to your compendium for upgrades.
